level.heading: Determination of deficiencies.
level.text: If a return required by this chapter is not filed, or if a return when filed is incorrect or insufficient, the amount of tax due shall be determined by the Mayor from such information as may be obtainable. Assessments of any deficiencies in the tax due under this chapter, or any interest and penalties thereon, shall be governed by § 47-4312.

level.heading: Section References
level.text: This section is referenced in § 47-2007, § 47-2021, and § 47-2213.
